content: the **gemstone hues granny blanket** is a stunning vibrant piece of home decor that is sure to brighten up any room and your day worked *back and forth in row* with the timeless and classic *granny stitch* this blanket is a cozy crochet masterpiece and a delightful colorwork journey whether you re just starting your crochet adventure or a seasoned pro looking for a relaxing and satisfying project the gemstone hues granny blanket has something unique to offer its simple yet beautiful design makes it a breeze to follow while the vibrant color palette keeps every stitch exciting you ll love how the colorwork sections come together to form a colorful eye-catching design that will warm your heart and home a video tutorial is provided to give guidance as you make your gorgeous blanket crochet hook i 5 5mm - or size to meet gauge 1 notions removable stitch marker 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 yarn lion brand color theory 5 100% acrylic 246yds/100g colors shown moonbeam a tourmaline b himalayan salt c canyon d yardage total yardage 3 155 yds color a 1875 yds 8 skeins color b 550 yds 3 skeins color c 335 yds 2 skeins color d 425 yds 2 skeins yarn substitutions wecrochet brava tweed 6 97% premium acrylic 3% viscose 218yds/100g lion brand pound of love 7 100% acrylic 1020yds /16oz mary maxim maximum value 8 100% acrylic 474yds/8oz herrschners worsted 8 heathers 9 100% acrylic 489yds/8oz abbreviations alt color - alternate color blo - back loop only chain s - chain s rs - right side slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 10 ws - wrong side yo - yarn over gauge 14 sts x 8 row = 4 x4 in stitch pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 11 sizes 49 wide x 62 tall width can be adjusted skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 12 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 13 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 14 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 15 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 16 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 17 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern
